LanguageData.SydailyVine.label: Sydaily Vine
LanguageData.SydailyVine.description:
This is a vine cut from Sydaily's headdress, used to revive a creature lost its vital signs. 
By attaching its roots to the crystal on the head of the Ferian, and attaching the other four to the edge of its forehead, she contains enough energy to activate the Sydaily Crystal. 


For Aliens, you can stick it in its ear or nose.
LanguageData.SydailyVine_Tiny.label: Sydaily Vine
LanguageData.SydailyVine_Tiny.description: A few scattered vines for medical use. \nYou can treat many small wounds at once, or you can heal the most serious ones
